dr.evomodel.indel
Class IstvanOperator

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.indel.IstvanOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MCMCOperator
public class IstvanOperator
extends SimpleMCMCOperator

Implements branch exchange operations. There is a NARROW and WIDE variety. The narrow exchange is very similar to a rooted-tree nearest-neighbour interchange but with the restriction that node height must remain consistent.
